features: THE SSD ALL-STAR: The latest 870 EVO has indisputable performance, reliability and compatibility built upon Samsung's pioneering technology.Computer Platform:PC.Encryption : Class 0 (AES 256) TCG/Opal v2.0, MS eDrive (IEEE1667), Environmental Specs - Shock : 1,500 G & 0.5 ms (Half sine).

EXCELLENCE IN PERFORMANCE: Enjoy professional level SSD performance with 870 EVO, which maximizes the SATA interface limit to 560/530 MB/s sequential speeds, Accelerates write speeds and maintains long term high performance with a larger variable buffer
INDUSTRY DEFINING RELIABILITY: Meet the demands of every task from everyday computing to 8K video processing, with up to 2,400 TBW

MORE COMPATIBLE THAN EVER: 870 EVO has been compatibility tested for major host systems and applications, including chipsets, motherboards, NAS, and video recording devices. Interface- SATA 6GB/s, compatible with SATA 3GB/s and SATA 1.5GB/s interfaces
body.description: The latest 870 EVO has indisputable performance, reliability and compatibility built upon Samsung's pioneering technology.*Performance may vary based on SSD’s firmware version and system hardware & configuration. Sequential write performance measurements are based on Intelligent TurboWrite technology. Test system configuration: Intel Core i7-7700K CPU @ 4.20GHz, DDR4 1200MHz 32GB, OS – Windows 10 Pro x64, Chipset: ASUS PRIME Z270-A. All performance data was measured with the SSD as a secondary***5-years or TBW, whichever comes first. ****Compatibility tests conducted with Samsung internal, AMD, MSI, Gigabyte, Synology, QNAP, BlackMagicDesign and ATMOS.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Over 5x Faster Than (Good) HDD
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to update a good running Windows 10 PC with upgraded RAM and a relatively fast quad-core processor being held back by the HDD. Any time a program was opened there was a delay due to the HDD. Windows "task manager" illustrates the HDD vs SSD for a typical large program.The job was comically easy and the results are a drive that now reads 5-6x and writes 7-8x faster than the HDD (per the Samsung software metrics) with no observed downside (other than the cost and a couple of hours of my time).I'm not a computer tech and have no special skills or equipment. Here's how I did it.1. PrepareKnow how to open a PC and work in it safely. Know the basics. The drive will need power via a power cable and signal to the main board via a SATA cable. I used the power and SATA cables from the original drive, and removed the HDD to "archive" in case of future failure / retrofit (I do not need a 2nd drive for storage). Decide how you intend to mount a smaller 2.5" drive in place of a 3.5" original (buy an adapter). Easiest way I found to clone the drive is to buy an aftermarket USB to SATA drive "adapter" cable. This allows the old drive to stay installed as-is while connecting the new SSD via USB to do the drive clone. Know what kind of USB ports your machine has. Mine has USB 2.0 and a USB 3.0 to SATA cable is usually not backward compatible.2. Clone the driveDownload and install the (free) Samsung "Data Migration" software from their website. Make sure when you open this software nothing else is running, and you don't run anything else while it is running. Connect the USB to SATA cable to the SSD and then plug it into the PCs USB port. The software should detect it. If it does not I have no idea what you would do. Then it's as simple as picking the source drive, picking the new SSD as the destination drive, and clicking OK. This cloning process can take 4-5 hours easily on even a moderately large drive (1TB). Don't panic, just let it run. At points it may appear to have not started or not finished but it is likely working fine. At the end, the PC will shut down.3. Install the driveWith the power off and your hands grounded, open the case and unplug both the power and SATA cables from the old drive. Remove the old drive. Physically mount the new drive. Connect both the power and SATA cables to the new SSD. Power the machine back up.4. Check functionIf you did it correctly, the PC should boot back up, and a lot faster than before. Download and install the (free) Samsung "Magician" software from their website. This has all sorts of neat diagnostic tests to show speed, update firmware, etc.Rejoice in spending a little bit of money to get a huge performance increase and not needing to go out and buy a new computer.**UPDATE**I performed the same upgrade on an older but still very good laptop computer than has very similar issues and results. It was even easier than the desktop PC as the original 2.5" HDD was the exact same physical size. I couldn't be happier with the performance and ease of this upgrade. The computer boots up in seconds. It runs quietly and cool. Every function works perfectly and noticeably (a lot) faster. This appears to be the best performance upgrade you can give an older computer with an OE HDD.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elevate Your PC Gaming with Easy Samsung SSD Upgrade: Fast, Efficient, Cost-Saving
reviews.reviewText: TL;DR: Upgraded Dell gaming PC with Samsung SSD, self-installation, easy setup, improved performance, cost-effective.I recently bought a new Dell gaming computer and decided to upgrade it with an SSD. Dell's pricing for adding an SSD was steep, so I turned to Amazon and found the SAMSUNG Electronics 870 EVO 2TB 2.5 Inch SATA III Internal SSD. After confirming through online videos that my computer model had the necessary brackets and connections for an easy installation, I made the purchase.Installing the SSD was straightforward. I used Windows Disk Management (accessible via Windows key + X) for the initial setup. The process was simple, and there are plenty of online resources for specific settings. Once set up, the drive was immediately recognized by my system.This upgrade has been a game-changer, particularly as my computer originally came with a disk-based hard drive. The SSD offers faster boot-up times and significantly higher data transfer speeds, enhancing the overall performance of my gaming PC. It was a cost-effective way to improve my new computer, and I highly recommend this approach to anyone looking to boost their PC's capabilities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for gaming or work!
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new, fast drive with good storage capacity for some 3D work, and this fit the bill perfectly. My motherboard does not have an NVMe slot, so the only other choice was an SSD, if I still wanted high speeds. I already have another of these drives specifically for gaming, and I know how reliable and fast it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Used this Samsung drive to upgrade a Dell Inspiron mini 1012 laptop purchased at a swap meet to an SSD. Used a desktop computer and Clonezilla to copy an image of the old 250 GB Western Digital Scorpio Black mechanical hard drive to a USB flash drive and then transfer that image to this 250 GB Samsung 870 EVO SATA SSD. The process went quickly and the new SSD functioned perfectly when inserted into the laptop's drive bay. The laptop boots up more quickly and should use less power from the battery (didn't measure the exact difference in current consumption between the two, though). Easy, relatively quick, and trouble-free upgrade. Very reasonable price for a lower capacity SSD for basic everyday use and upgrade in an older computer. (I wanted a well-known, trusted brand for this upgrade.) Note that the drive came with no hardware or cables.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: the Samsung 870 EVO SATA III SSD has proven to be a game-changing upgrade for my PC. The combination of speed, reliability, and ample storage capacity makes it a standout choice for users looking to enhance their computing experience. Whether you're a gamer, creative professional, or simply looking to revitalize an aging system, the Samsung 870 EVO is a solid investment that delivers on its promises. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great SSD and software
reviews.reviewText: Worked great and the best part was the Samsung Magician software. It was easy to used and allowed me to fully clone my existing drive to the new drive very quickly. The new SSD booted up the PC and all worked great

Necesitaba más espacio para mí ps4, ya que solo venía con 1tb, fue fácil de cambiar, y no he tenido problema con el uso, ya llevo un par de meses usándola.Y en efecto, noto un poco más rápidas las pantallas de carga.Recomendado, quizá el empaque pudiera ser mejor, aunque no está mal.

reviews.reviewTitle: Elevate Your Storage: Samsung 870 EVO 1TB SATA Internal SSD
reviews.reviewText: The Samsung 870 EVO 1TB SATA Internal SSD has revolutionized my storage experience, and I'm thrilled to award it a perfect five-star rating. This SSD offers unparalleled performance, capacity, and reliability, making it an essential upgrade for anyone seeking to enhance their computing experience.From the moment I installed the Samsung 870 EVO SSD, its impact was immediate. The 1TB capacity provides ample space for storing my files, applications, and media. Whether it's high-resolution videos, large game installations, or extensive photo libraries, this SSD handles it all without compromising on speed.The SATA interface ensures compatibility with a wide range of systems, making it a versatile choice for upgrades or new builds. The easy installation process means that I could seamlessly integrate it into my existing setup, transforming my system's performance without any hassle.The speed and responsiveness of the Samsung 870 EVO are truly remarkable. The SSD's read and write speeds enhance boot times, application launches, and file transfers. Whether I'm multitasking or engaging in resource-intensive tasks, the SSD's performance ensures a seamless computing experience.The durability of the Samsung 870 EVO is a standout feature. Samsung's reputation for quality and reliability is evident in this SSD's construction. With a robust design and advanced technology, it offers peace of mind, knowing that my data is safe and secure.The Samsung Magician software is a valuable addition. It allows me to monitor the SSD's performance, optimize settings, and manage updates. This software adds an extra layer of control and customization, allowing me to tailor the SSD's performance to my needs.In conclusion, the Samsung 870 EVO 1TB SATA Internal SSD is a five-star storage solution that delivers exceptional performance, capacity, and reliability. Its large capacity, SATA compatibility, impressive speed, durability, and user-friendly software make it an essential upgrade for anyone seeking to enhance their computing experience. Whether you're a gamer, content creator, or power user, this internal SSD is the perfect choice that has earned its five-star rating through its exceptional design and performance-enhancing benefits.

Já possuo outros ssd Samsung, a marca já diz tudo, alta qualidade, durabilidade, esse novo modelo 870 evo eu ainda não o tinha, gostei demais desse ssd, original e pretendo comprar outras unidades , recomendo.
